sentence.Network_en: The governments acted in unison to combat terrorism.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些国家的政府一致行动对付恐怖主义.

jx.jx_en_mean: At the same time; at once.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Old French, or from late Latin unisonus, from Latin uni- 'one' + sonus 'sound'

encyclopedia.content: unison作为一个单词来说，具备“和谐、一致”的名词意义，以及“齐奏、齐唱”的音乐术语意义。但同时，其也是著名开源软件——“Unison File Synchronizer”的名称。Unison远程同步复制软件的官方网址参考。 Unison是一款跨windows/linux/MAC OS平台的文件同步工具，不仅支持本地对本地同步，也支持通过SSH、RSH和Socket等网络协议进行同步。更棒的是，Unison支持双向同步操作，你既可以从A同步到B，也可以从B同步到A，这些都不需

entry.def: If two or more people do something in unison, they do it together at the same time.

example.ex: The students gave him a rapturous welcome, chanting in unison: 'We want the king!'...
example.tran: 学生们给予了他热烈的欢迎，他们齐声高喊：“我们要国王！”

example.ex: Michael and the landlady nodded in unison.
example.tran: 迈克尔和房东太太一起点头。

entry.def: If people or organizations act in unison, they act the same way because they agree with each other or because they want to achieve the same aims.

example.ex: For churches not normally noted for their ability to act in unison, today's unprecedented move was all the more remarkable...
example.tran: 对于通常无法统一行动的各个教会来说，今天这一前所未有的举动无疑更加非同寻常。

example.ex: The international community is ready to work in unison against him.
example.tran: 国际社会准备联手反对他。

means.word_mean: 3. (music) two or more sounds or tones at the same pitch or in octaves;

stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一,单个+ped脚→adj.单足的,独腿的
unique独一无二+ly表副词→adv.独特地,唯一地,珍奇地
uni单一,单个+son声音→一个声音→和谐
unify[v.使联合,统一;使相同,使一致]+ication表名词→unification统一,单一化
uni单一,单个+on表名词→n.联合, 合并
uni单一,单个+t→n.个体,[计量]单位
uni单一,单个+ty表名词→n.团结;统一,一致,整体
unit个体+e→v.联合,团结;统一,合并 v.使联合
uni一个,单一+form形状→adj.一贯的,一致的
uni一个,单一+lingual语言的→adj.只用一种语言的
uni一个,单一+son声音→一个声音→和谐

sentences.en: ‘Good morning, Mrs Crawford,’ the children shouted in unison.
sentences.cn: “早上好，克劳福德夫人。”孩子们一齐喊道。

sentences.en: I am pleased to report that the various committees are now working in unison to thoroughly investigate this matter.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴地告诉大家，各委员会正在一致行动，彻底调查这件事。

sentences.en: They ran together, their legs moving in unison.
sentences.cn: 他们步调一致地一起跑。

sentences.en: The governments acted in unison to combat terrorism.
sentences.cn: 这些国家的政府一致行动对付恐怖主义。
